column1: The frenzy over coronavirus and fear of contracting the illness have led some people to engage in racist and discriminatory behavior towards Chinese and Asian people in general. @hollielao spoke to some students about the impact on their communities:https://dailycampus.com/stories/2020/07/02/caring-and-community-in-the-face-of-coronavirus-how-uconn-students-have-been-affected-by-racist-sentiment …
